Description:
Supply Chain Manager (FMCG)Inventory Management:Monitor and manage inventory levels to ensure optimal stock levels.
Implement inventory control measures to minimize wastage and stockouts.
Analyze demand forecasts to determine inventory requirements.Supplier Relationship Management:Identify and evaluate potential suppliers for quality and cost-effectiveness.
Negotiate terms and conditions with suppliers to ensure favorable contracts.
Establish and maintain strong relationships with key suppliers.Logistics Management:Plan and optimize transportation routes to reduce costs and delivery times.
Coordinate with logistics partners for efficient warehousing and distribution.
Track shipments and ensure on-time delivery to customers.Demand Planning:Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to forecast demand accurately.
Develop and maintain demand planning models to support production scheduling.
Adjust supply chain strategies based on changing market conditions.Quality Control:Implement quality control procedures to ensure the highest product standards.
Conduct regular quality audits of suppliers and production facilities.
Address quality issues promptly and implement corrective actions.Cost Management:Monitor and analyze supply chain costs, identifying areas for cost reduction.
Develop and implement cost-effective procurement and sourcing strategies.
Optimize the use of resources to achieve cost-efficiency.Risk Management:Identify potential risks in the supply chain and develop risk mitigation plans.
Maintain contingency plans for supply disruptions or emergencies.
Ensure compliance with local regulations and customs requirements.Data Analysis and Reporting:Utilize data analytics tools to track key performance indicators (KPIs).
Generate regular reports on supply chain performance and make data-driven recommendations.
Continuously analyze data to identify opportunities for improvement.Team Leadership and Development:Supervise and mentor supply chain staff, ensuring their growth and development.
Foster a collaborative and efficient team environment.
Allocate tasks and responsibilities effectively within the team.Sustainability Initiatives:Explore and implement sustainable practices within the supply chain.
Reduce the environmental footprint by optimizing transportation and packaging.
Stay informed about sustainable sourcing options and industry best practices.Compliance and Regulations:Ensure compliance with all relevant laws and regulations related to supply chain operations in Saudi Arabia.
Stay updated on changes in regulatory requirements and implement necessary adjustments.Continuous Improvement:Implement process improvement initiatives such as Six Sigma or Lean methodologies.
Continuously evaluate and refine supply chain processes to enhance efficiency and productivity.Skills
